title: Influence of labelling medical advice as AI-compared to human-generated on perceived reliability, empathy, and comprehensibility

abstract: Large Language Models (LLM) offer novel opportunities to receive digital medical advice. While previous research primarily addressed performance of such artificial intelligence (AI)-based tools, public perception of these advancements has received …
